extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite      A GPA of 2.0 in 6.0 PHIL.
One-Way exclusion    May not be taken with or after CISC204.

basic.description:
From propositional calculus to first-order monadic predicate calculus. Symbolization, rules of inference, derivation and refutation of arguments.
NOTE    Also offered as a distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Introduction to Logic
